properties.Title: Highway 91 Southbound - Expect Delays
properties.Content: Vehicle Stall on Highway 91 Southbound after Ramp from Cliveden Ave is now clear. Updated on Wed May 10 3:18 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13498)

properties.Title: Highway 1 Both directions - Single Lane Alternating
properties.Content: Road Work on Highway 1, 1 KM North of Yale. Single lane alternating traffic will be in effect Monday to Friday effective 08/05/2017 until 12/05/2017 from 7:00:00 AM to 5:30:00 PM daily. Expect delays. Updated on Thu May 4 10:59 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_13426)

properties.Title: Highway 1 Both directions - Single Lane Alternating
properties.Content: Road sweeping Highway 1 both directions between Boston Bar and Jackass Mountain will be in effect daily from 09/05/2017 at 7:00 AM until 11/05/2017 at 5:30 PM. Updated on Thu May 4 11:01 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_13427)

properties.Title: Highway 1 Both directions - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Abbotsford Tulip Festival at No. 3 Rd will occur Friday, Saturday and Sunday starting April 10 through May 14 from 9am-7pm. Expect delays. Updated on Fri Mar 17 12:48 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_12926)

properties.Title: Highway 1 Both directions - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Maintenance in the Cassiar Tunnel will be in effect nightly 10:30:00 PM until 5:00:00 AM from May 14-16. Lane closures will be in effect. Updated on Fri Apr 28 2:57 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_13364)

properties.Title: Highway 1 Eastbound - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Bridge Maintenance on Ironworkers Memorial Bridge will be in effect today 10pm until 10/05/2017 at 5:00:00 AM. Right lane closure will be in effect. Updated on Tue May 9 10:26 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13488)

properties.Title: Highway 1 Eastbound - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Deck patching on Hunter Creek Bridge will be in effect on 09/05/2017 from 8:30am to 3:30 pm. Lane closure will be in effect. Updated on Mon May 8 4:05 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13471)

properties.Title: Highway 1 Eastbound - Expect Delays
properties.Content: Road Work on Highway 1 Eastbound And Westbound from Bradner Rd to MacCallum Rd, temporarily close WB ramp at McCallum &amp; Clearbrook. As well as temporarily close EB ramp at Fraser Hwy. This will be in effect May 12, 2017 at 1:00 AM until 1:10 AM. Updated on Thu May 4 3:56 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13435)

properties.Title: Highway 1 Eastbound - Expect Delays
properties.Content: Road Work on Highway 1 Eastbound after Ramp from Fraser Hwy to Clearbrook Road. Blocking the right lane East bound and West bound. will be in effect May 11, 2017 at 10:00 AM until May 12, 2017 at 5:00 AM. Updated on Thu May 4 3:46 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13434)

properties.Title: Highway 1 Westbound - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Highway 1 Westbound will be closed after Ramp to Keith Rd because of Road Work. Road Work will be in until 01/06/2017 at 11:59:00 PM. Access to Marine Drive via Highway 1 NB at Exit 3 will be closed due to construction effective until June 01, 2017. All traffic must use use Exit 2. Updated on Mon Apr 3 6:31 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_12994)

properties.Title: Highway 10 Westbound - Expect Delays
properties.Content: Cloverdale Rodeo Parade on Highway 10 Westbound between 177 B St and 176 St will be in effect 20/05/2017 at 8:00 AM until 12:00 PM. Surrey RCMP will be in attendance to control traffic. Motorists to obey traffic control personnel and signage. Updated on Mon May 8 2:05 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13466)

properties.Title: Highway 101 Both directions - Heavy Delays
properties.Content: Special Event will be in effectbetween Joncas Pl and Sutherland Ave on May 19, 2017 from 9:15am to 9:45am. Expect delays up to 30 mins. Updated on Tue May 9 5:21 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13103)

properties.Title: Highway 101 Both directions - Single Lane Alternating
properties.Content: Crack sealing in Gibsons will be in effect daily 8am-7pm starting May 9-16. The road will be reduced to single lane alternating traffic with 5-10 minute delays. Updated on Mon May 8 3:52 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13469)

properties.Title: Highway 101 Eastbound - Expect Delays
properties.Content: Crack sealing on Highway 101 between Gibsons and Sechelt will be in effect May 5th to May 19th from 7:00 AM to 7:00 PM. Expect 20 min delays. Updated on Tue Apr 25 7:47 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_13324)

properties.Title: Highway 11 Northbound - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Road Work on Highway 11 Northbound before Vye Road. Right lane closure will be in effect 01/05/2017 until 15/05/2017 from8:00:00 PM until 5:00:00 AM nightly. Drive with care. Updated on Thu Apr 20 11:42 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_13286)

properties.Title: Highway 17 SFPR Eastbound - Expect Delays
properties.Content: Road Maintenance on Highway 17 Eastbound after Hwy 91 Connector will be in effect May 10, 2017 at 9:00 AM until 12:00 PM. Right lane will be blocked for pothole repairs during this time. Updated on Wed May 10 9:15 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_13493)

properties.Title: Highway 3 Both directions - Expect Delays
properties.Content: Road Work between Sunday Summit and Manning Park Boundary will be in effect daily May 1, 2017 to July 31, 2017, 8:30 AM to 6:00 PM. Temporary lane closures and single lane alternating traffic may be in effect. Traffic is reduced to 70 KM/Hr. Updated on Tue May 9 6:09 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13397)

properties.Title: Highway 7 Both directions - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Road Maintenance between Dyke Rd and Bodnar Rd will daily 10/05/2017 until 24/05/2017 from 7:00:00 AM to 7:00:00 PM. Lane closures will be in effect. Updated on Tue May 9 6:49 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13484)

properties.Title: Highway 7 Eastbound - None
properties.Content: Road cycling relay from Junction with Boundary Road, in Burnaby to Mission, 6:00 am to 6:00 pm on Wed May 10. La Grande Traversee is a national road cycling relay for high school students. The relay will have police escort throughout the province of BC. Motorists to watch for cyclists and obey police escorts. Updated on Fri Apr 28 at 3:00 am PDT. (ID# -63378)

properties.Title: Highway 7 Westbound - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Electrical work at Highway 11 junction will be in effect 11/05/2017 at 8:00:00 PM until 12/05/2017 at 3:00:00 AM. Lane closures will be in effect. Updated on Tue May 9 7:08 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13485)

properties.Title: Highway 7B Eastbound - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Roadside brushing on Highway 7B Eastbound after Pitt River Rd will be in effect May 10 at 8:30 AM until 3:00 PM. A rolling right lane closure will be in place during this time. Updated on Wed May 10 8:31 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_13491)

properties.Title: Highway 9 Northbound - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Bridge maintenance on Agassiz-Rosedale Bridge will occur on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday effective 09/05/2017 until 11/05/2017 from 8:30:00 AM to 3:30:00 PM. Lane closure will be in effect. Updated on Mon May 8 4:09 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13472)

properties.Title: Highway 99 Both directions - Expect Delays
properties.Content: Special Event between Old Pemberton Farm Road and North Arm Farm will be in effect 20/05/2017 at 11:00:00 AM until 11:10:00 AM. Expect 10 minute delays. Updated on Wed May 10 2:49 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13497)

properties.Title: Highway 99 Both directions - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Bridge washing on Gonzales Creek Bridge daily effective May 7, 2017 until May 17, 2017 from 7:30 AM to 5:30 PM. Right lane closure will be in effect. Updated on Wed May 3 4:51 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13383)

properties.Title: Highway 99 Both directions - Drive Carefully

properties.Title: Highway 99 Northbound - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Road Maintenance in Massey Tunnel will be in effect today 10pm until 10/05/2017 at 5:00:00 AM. Lane closure will be in effect. Updated on Tue May 9 10:24 pm PDT. (ID# RTMC_13487)

properties.Title: Highway 99 Northbound - Drive Carefully
properties.Content: Road work on Highway 99 Northbound at Britannia Hill will be in effect May 06, at 8:00 AM until May 12, at 8:00 PM. Updated on Fri May 5 10:32 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_13450)

properties.Title: Highway 99 Northbound - Expect Delays
properties.Content: Paving operations on Highway 99 Northbound between Depot Rd and Garibaldi will be in effect 08/05/2017 at 9:00 AM until 02/06/2017 at 4:00 PM. No work after 12:00 pm Fridays, weekends or US/Canadian holidays. Updated on Mon May 8 8:40 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_13464)
